comment._content: Great. Hi, I'm an admin for a group called People love their Work, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 74408877@N06
comment._content: Please be the first to join my new group and add this picture About 'Its a job' www.flickr.com/groups/1868800@N24/ Its a job This group is all about people and what we do to earn money.... We all need money and we all earn it in different ways. Some people like their work, some not so .....lets try and capture every aspect To make this group grow I need your help, spread the word and lets see what we can create together. I cant wait to see your images....
